resources.string: View lists: allows you to see all the created lists, access them and to add a new one.
View tasks: allows you to see tasks from all of the lists, except from those with the simple template.
Change list name: enables changing name of the active list.
Sort by priority: sorts tasks by priority. If some of the lists screen is active, sorting its tasks is performed. Otherwise, tasks from all of the lists are sorted by priority.
Sort by due date: sorts tasks by date. If some of the lists screen is active, sorting its tasks is performed. Otherwise, tasks from all of the lists are sorted by due date.
View unfinished: shows tasks that need to be done. If some of the lists screen is active, showing its unfinished tasks is performed. Otherwise, unfinished tasks from all of the lists are shown.
View finished: shows tasks that are done. If some of the lists screen is active, showing its finished tasks is performed. Otherwise, finished tasks from all of the lists are shown.

string.name: helpTitle
string.b: Following options are available in the menu:

string.name: help12
string.b: Return to the previous screen by touching the Back button on your phone.

resources.string: Entering the first field in the task is obligatory, filling the other ones is optional.
